docs.title: Description

docs.text: Registers NBN with the NBN Resolver
docs.title: dd-register-nbn

docs.text: Configuration ¶ This module can be configured by editing the configuration file. This file is installed in /etc/opt/dans.knaw.nl/dd-register-nbn/config.yml when using the RPM. The settings are explained with comments in the file itself. An on-line version of the latest configuration file can be found here .
docs.title: Configuration

docs.title: Development

docs.text: Installation ¶ Currently, this project is built as an RPM package for RHEL8 and later. The RPM will install the binaries to /opt/dans.knaw.nl/dd-register-nbn and the configuration files to /etc/opt/dans.knaw.nl/dd-register-nbn . For installation on systems that do no support RPM and/or systemd: Build the tarball (see next section). Extract it to some location on your system, for example /opt/dans.knaw.nl/dd-register-nbn . Start the service with the following command /opt/dans.knaw.nl/dd-register-nbn/bin/dd-register-nbn server /opt/dans.knaw.nl/dd-register-nbn/cfg/config.yml Building from source ¶ Prerequisites: Java 17 or higher Maven 3.3.3 or higher RPM (optional, only if you want to build the RPM package) Steps: git clone https://github.com/DANS-KNAW/dd-register-nbn.git cd dd-register-nbn mvn clean install If the rpm executable is found at /usr/local/bin/rpm , the build profile that includes the RPM packaging will be activated. If rpm is available, but at a different path, then activate it by using Maven's -P switch: mvn -Pprm install . Alternatively, to build the tarball execute: mvn clean install assembly:single
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: The API is defined in dd-register-nbn-api . The version implemented by this service can be viewed in Swagger UI in a new tab: API .
